text: Halali balia abatilana nende Abandu bamuli nabo hakari wenyu indache, nohomba babetselanganeebilifubiabubilinendeobusiro okhupana ninenyu, nohomba okhupana nende Abandu babu. Ne Nyasaye yenyanga yakhabasaasiyekhwo bakhupana ninanyu, kho nibabawukhakho, bakhaye okhulwana ni nanyu, mana bamurebe omulembe, kho awo Nyasaye shabehelesia injila yokhupana ninabo tawe
